resumeDTO.ocrResult: "[\"# Page 1\\n\\n[Phone] 010-3091-4415\\n\\n[GitHub] [https://github.com/aaiss0927](https://github.com/aaiss0927)\\n\\n[Velog] [https://velog.io/@aaiss0927/posts](https://velog.io/@aaiss0927/posts)\\n\\n                              -                               \\n[LinkedIn] [https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaiss](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaiss-hyeonjun-jo) hyeonjun jo\\n\\n\\n[Email] aaiss0927@gmail.com\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n**ABOUT ME** Computers are truly convenient tools. I could always find answers to my questions\\n\\nthrough internet searches, and visually stunning games provided endless\\n\\nentertainment. Computers, which had been a constant presence since my childhood,\\n\\nwere familiar and taken for granted, and how they worked was beyond my interest. I\\n\\nsimply perceived them as convenient tools.\\n\\n\\nUpon learning that computers, which I had merely seen as convenient tools, were the\\n\\nmain players in the Third Industrial Revolution and play a crucial role in the Fourth\\n\\nIndustrial Revolution, I became eager to delve deeper into the essence of computer\\n\\nscience. I was particularly fascinated by artificial intelligence technology, which\\n\\npossesses more extensive and flexible problem-solving capabilities compared to\\n\\ntraditional programming methods.\\n\\n\\nIn July 2024, during the university's ideathon, I proposed an AI-powered counselor\\n\\nprotection solution, exploring the practical applicability of emotion analysis and voice\\n\\nmodulation technologies. Throughout this process, I broadened my understanding of AI\\n\\napplications and implementation methods by referencing academic papers and books,\\n\\nwhich later became a catalyst for developing the ability to apply theories to real-world\\n\\nenvironments in my major studies.\\n\\n\\nI enrolled in Naver Boostcamp AI Tech's Computer Vision track, scheduled for\\n\\ncompletion from August 2024 to February 2025. I learned the fundamental theories of\\n\\ndeep learning and had the opportunity to apply these theories through competition\\nstyle projects. Through multiple projects, I was able to acquire skills in using generative\\n\\nAI, data augmentation, and ensemble techniques, as well as experience collaboration\\n\\nusing platforms such as GitHub, Jira, and Notion. During this process, I recognized the\\n\\nneed for additional learning in calculus, statistics, and linear algebra for a deeper\\n\\nunderstanding of theories and recent papers and pursued advanced studies in these\\n\\nareas. Moreover, through several AI projects, I realized that securing high-quality\\n\\ndatasets and thoroughly understanding data characteristics are as crucial for improving\\n\\nmodel performance as incorporating models with numerous parameters.\\n\\n\\nPage | 1 [Hyeonjun Jo]\", '# Page 2\\n\\n**EDUCATION** **[INHA UNIVERSITY, INCHEON, 2022]**\\n\\n\\n**DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER ENGINEERING**\\n\\n**TOTAL GPA 4.31 / 4.5   MAJOR GPA 4.33 / 4.5**\\n\\n\\n**[NAVER BOOSTCAMP AI TECH 7** **[TH]** **, SEONGNAM, 2024]**\\n\\n\\n**COMPUTER VISION TRACK**\\n\\n**PROCEED WITH A NUMBER OF COLLABORATIVE PROJECTS**\\n\\n\\n**PROJECT** **[X-RAY IMAGE SEGMENTATION]**\\n\\n\\n￭ Build a model capable of predicting the class of each pixel in an image\\n\\n\\n￭ Apply sharpening filters to mitigate blurring effects that occur during image upscaling\\n\\n\\n￭ Establish a baseline code for image segmentation\\n\\n\\n**[OBJECT DETECTION FOR RECYCLING ITEM CLASSIFICATION]**\\n\\n\\n￭ Build a model capable of detecting objects and predicting their classes within images\\n\\n\\n￭ [Provide meaningful insights through data visualization using Streamlit (link)](https://github.com/aaiss0927/level2-objectdetection-cv-12/tree/main/Utils/streamlit)\\n\\n\\n￭ Perform optimal Weighted Box Fusion (WBF) ensemble by applying Bayesian\\noptimization techniques\\n\\n\\n**[SKETCH IMAGE CLASSIFICATION]**\\n\\n\\n￭ Develop a model capable of predicting the class of sketch images\\n\\n\\n￭ Perform data relabeling to remove noise from the training data\\n\\n\\n￭ Generate images using Stable Diffusion to address class imbalance issues\\n\\n\\n**[ANALYSIS AND Q&A ON KOREAN ECONOMIC ARTICLES]**\\n\\n\\n￭ Develop a question-answering model for complex Korean economic articles\\n\\n\\n￭ Apply sliding window technique to overcome limitations of BERT-based models\\n\\n\\n￭ Improve string search efficiency by utilizing the KMP algorithm\\n\\n\\n**[MOVIE RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM]**\\n\\n\\n￭ Develop a personalized movie recommendation algorithm based on user rating data\\n\\n\\n￭ Implement a user similarity analysis module
